wikibase-export-description: Adds a user-friendly Wikibase export page
wikibase-export-intro: First, choose the items for which you need data. Second, choose the time range for which you need the data. Third, choose the variables you need in the CSV file. Finally, click "$1" to retrieve the CSV file.
wikibase-export-intro-admin-notice: As an administrator, you can [[Special:WikibaseExportConfig|configure this form]].
wikibase-export-config-invalid: Your changes were not saved. It contains the following {{PLURAL:$1|error|errors}}:
wikibase-export-config-incomplete: An administrator needs to configure Wikibase Export before it can be used.
wikibase-export-config-help-messages: You can change the following export page text snippets:
wikibase-export-config-help-message-intr: Introductory text shown before the form
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-def: List of IDs of items that should be selected by default.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-sta: Property ID of the qualifier used for the start of a time range.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-end: Property ID of the qualifier used for the end of a time range.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-poi: Property ID of the qualifier used for a specific point in time.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-pro: List of IDs of properties (with qualifiers) for statements that may be included in the export.
List of IDs of properties (without qualifiers) for statements that may be included in the export.
wikibase-export-config-help-variable-sub: Property ID of the statement used to filter items that may be included in the export.
Expected value of the subject filter property.
